title: Trump Attacks Protesting Athletes: A Closer Look | Jordan Klepper | Josh Earnest
description:
Seth takes a break from breaking news to check in on how President Trump spent the weekend attacking athletes for peacefully protesting police brutality.
Seth then speaks to guests Jordan Klepper and Josh Earnest, who both take additional questions backstage at Studio 8G for this podcast.
